statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model_name=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); output_style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); printf "\033[36m%s\033[0m \033[32m%s\033[0m \033[35m[%s]\033[0m" "$(basename "$current_dir")" "$model_name" "$output_style"
